IF( NOT BTPARSE_FOUND )
  ADD_SUBDIRECTORY( btparse )
ENDIF( NOT BTPARSE_FOUND )
IF( NOT CSV_FOUND )
  ADD_SUBDIRECTORY( libcsv )
ENDIF( NOT CSV_FOUND )
ADD_SUBDIRECTORY( rtf2html )
ADD_SUBDIRECTORY( pilotdb )
